title: Flame
body: For real there's 2 premade guys flaming me all time and why they dont get ban? i banned them? and i have them again in game and flame for no fvcking reason again. i dont know wtf wrong with you rito team but you dont know how to work this game.

replies.body: The best way to alert us to stuff like that is to smash that report button in the post game lobby. We'll be able to review what happened in the game that way. if they've been harassing you outside of game, get some screenshots and shoot them our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
